body: pretty much only the art is salvageable, sadly, you can never really spect much more from hentai artists...

@mrsyiff Imagine seeing a donut and this donut is the most delicious-looking donut you have ever seen. You want to eat it and as you take a bite you realize that the delicious-looking donut tastes like shit and it ruins your whole experience. Now imagine that the donut not only looks fantastic but also tastes hella...heavenly awesome. It's great and you keep eating it and then you eat it over and over again until you're full or sick of it. 
That's about how a great story can enhance porn/hentai immensely.

Yo from the little I understand of japanese in the end they're lifting the 'exclusive use'.
Basically until now he, as the owner, was the only one fucking her, and now (As stated in chapter one), he's gonna have to use her to make money and share her around.

It's porn, why get invested in the story?

What I really dislike about this story is some loser guy get lucky, but then decided to be a massive asshole. In other stories, the assholes either get the girl on their own, or keeping the girls for themselves. The MC doesn't feel like any fuckboy/ugly bastard, so him being such an asshole is a turn off. Even more of a loser if he sell her off.

While the art is great, both the concept and the story are huge swing and miss.

I'm on with the guy bellow. I'm the type that is absurdly curious, and can't just disregard something that learned (so if there is a work with 200 pages and there is one that I find distasteful, it ruins the mood for my inability to ignore it's existence), and like such, I can't ignore my constant worries while looking at this one and the thought of him making a continuation that is as bad of an experience for me, or that straight up goes for gore or some asanagi level of kink.
a waste of good art and character design.
that's facts actually, I love sian and his works but some just aren't for me. This is isn't my kink but the art is good enough for me to like this one.

S&M can sometimes be excruciatingly kinky in a way that is scary and worrying, it's like a ticking bomb that if ends up exploding, will lead to guro and the cursed shit (although I personally know I would enjoy this a lot if it wasn't on this side of the force at all. Sian is like Pianissimo in which he either does some real good shit for all or he does some stuff that is heavily bent towards a specific public, such as NTR or SM)
